name: SSF5
title: Site-Specific Factor 5
subtitle: Assessment Method of Para-Aortic Nodal Status
notes:
**Note 1:**  The assessment results are recorded in **Site-Specific Factor 4, Para-Aortic Nodal Status**.

**Note 2:**  Use the highest applicable code.
